title: Calories in Plantain Banana
meta_description: Discover calories in plantain banana per medium serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition breakdown for better meal planning.
assumptions: Medium raw plantain banana (118 g edible portion, peeled); green/unripe variety. Plantains are starchy and often cooked.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by ripeness, size, variety, and cooking method (e.g., frying adds calories). Check labels or USDA data for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One medium raw plantain banana provides about 144 calories, primarily from complex carbs.

label_note: Values based on USDA data and formatted to match Nutrition Facts labels for easy reference.

faqs.q: How many calories in one plantain banana?
faqs.a: Approximately 144 calories for a medium raw plantain banana.

faqs.q: Are plantain bananas high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 38 g carbs per medium plantain, mostly starch with some natural sugars.

faqs.q: What's the protein in plantain banana?
faqs.a: Low at around 1.5 g per medium serving.
Boiling slightly reduces to ~136 kcal; frying adds 40+ kcal from oil.
Plantain has similar calories but more starch and less sweetness than a regular banana.
